CIRCULAR NO.  10 / 2007 
 
Subject: Facilities being provided to Members of Parliament while performing 
journeys by air. 
 
 
         As per instructions inforce vide Bureau Circular No. 15/2003, 1/2004 and 
12/2004 of parliament are entitled to gain entry to the passenger terminal building  
(upto check-in or baggage claim area as the case may be) area of civil airport/civil 
enclave in the country on the authority of their valid identity cards issued by 
Parliament Secretariat, New Delhi. 
 
2. 
Further to above, these instructions to all airport agencies are again reiterated 
to comply meticulously on ground reality. Due courtesy with polite behavior by the 
Airport Security agencies shall be extended to them while they  perform  journeys by 
air. 
 
3. 
One time Airport Entry Permit shall be issued to one personal staff of each 
Hon’ble M.P whenever requested for. 
 
          All airport in-charge/APSU and Airport Directors, AAI including the Private and 
Joint Venture airport operators shall ensure compliance of this Circular with letter and 
spirit 
 
 
(D.S Chauhan) 
 Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)
